tool_description: PlateToVin provides an API to convert license plates to VIN numbers.
name: PlateToVin
title: PlateToVin

api_list.name: Convert
api_list.description: Convert a license plate and state to VIN using this API
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://platetovin.p.rapidapi.com/convert"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "platetovin.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://platetovin.p.rapidapi.com/convert"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "platetovin.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
